issue.title: [Java] Avoid integer overflow for Json file reader
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10662](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10662). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For the current implementation, it uses `int` to represent the buffer size. However, the buffer can be larger than Integer.MAX_VALUE, which will lead to integer overflow and unexpected behaviors.
